contexts.context: ..., you do not need to use choice or <mark>expan</mark>; instead, you can simply tag the abbreviation...
...abbreviation using the full choice, abbr, and <mark>expan</mark> method below:
...abbr element, then tag your expansion with an <mark>expan</mark>, and then wrap both in a choice element...
...in an abbr and then use a choice and <mark>expan</mark> as above:
...author bibl choice corr date del desc editor emph <mark>expan</mark> foreign gloss head hi item l label mentioned name...
core: abbr choice corr <mark>expan</mark> orig reg sic unclear
